basic.label: Power Shard
basic.description: 6 Power (Increases the damage of basic attacks and other orange-text effects by 6%)

basic.label: Power Crystal
basic.description: 16 Power (Increases the damage of basic attacks and other orange-text effects by 16%)

basic.label: Power Relic
basic.description: 27 Power (Increases the damage of basic attacks and other orange-text effects by 27%)

recipes.label: Shadowveil
recipes.complexDescription:
+100 Max Health

^091Activate: apply shrouded for $duration$ seconds.  While shrouded, gain $movespeed$ Movement Speed and enemies must be within 600 range to see you.^*
recipes.description:
Grants Max Health
^091Activate: become Shrouded and gain Movement Speed.^*

Item_AssasinsShroud_Empower_1.complexDescription: Deal $damage_enchant$ bonus damage when attacking from shrouded.

Item_AssasinsShroud_Empower_2.complexDescription: Cooldown reduced by $cd_enchant$%, but shrouded no longer grants Movement Speed.

recipes.label: Dark Bargain
recipes.complexDescription:
^o+$damage$ Attack Damage^*

^091Activate: Spend 500 gold to gain ^o+$perm_bonus$ Attack Damage permanently and ^o+$bonus$ Attack Damage^* ^091temporarily for 8 seconds. No cooldown. Can be stacked.^*

Bonus ^oAttack Damage^*.

Item_Dark_Bargain_Empower_2.complexDescription: Reduces activation cost by $gold_enchant$. Attack Damage bonus becomes ^o+$perm_bonus$ permanent and ^o+$bonus$ temporary.

^o+$damage$ Attack Damage^*

Item_Frostbrand_Empower_3.complexDescription: Increases the slow percent by $slowincrease_enchant$ but decreases Attack Damage by $basedamage_enchant$.
